npcs.name: Lady Seraphine
npcs.notes: Balances revenue and public calm; dislikes blatant scandals.

npcs.name: Brother Malek
npcs.notes: Wants visible charity; sensitive to court overreach.

npcs.name: Captain Garran
npcs.notes: Obsessed with order; will trade favors for crackdowns.

npcs.name: Vexa “Whisper”
npcs.notes: Knows everyone’s dirt; responds to leverage and amnesty.

requests.title: Audit Relief for Bakers’ Guild
requests.description: Publicly reduce audits/fees for the Bakers’ Guild to stabilize bread prices.

bargain.label: Tie relief to a public thanks from Church

requests.title: Erase Donor’s Ledger Entry
requests.description: Quietly remove a noble donor’s tax debt from the records.

bargain.label: Erase debt but demand future ‘donation’ to public granaries

links.note: Vexa can use the erased record as blackmail.

requests.title: Fast-Track Tariff on ‘Luxury Spices’
requests.description: Reclassify certain imports to shore up revenue without open debate.

requests.title: Bread for the Poor
requests.description: Request court funds to expand the soup-kitchen line for a month.

bargain.label: Fund if Church publicly praises the Advisor

links.note: Mutual goodwill with guilds via charity.

requests.title: Divert Tithe Without Bishop’s Writ
requests.description: Reassign a tithe to an orphanage, bypassing formal approvals.

bargain.label: Get Guard escort to ‘secure’ the transfer

requests.title: Endorse the Advisor from the Pulpit
requests.description: A glowing sermon to improve the Advisor’s public standing.

bargain.label: Share court agenda to align with Church

requests.title: Fund Night Patrols
requests.description: Request coin to increase guard patrols after food-line scuffles.

bargain.label: Patrols protect Church soup lines first

links.note: With funding, Garran pursues quiet detentions.

requests.title: Plant Evidence on Rival Fixer
requests.description: Frame a rival smuggler to break the docks’ black market.

bargain.label: Trade: spare Vexa’s crew for Guard intel pipeline

links.note: Vexa faces heat after rival’s fall.

requests.title: Quietly Detain Agitator
requests.description: Hold a rabble-rouser overnight without charges to calm the quarter.

bargain.label: Release at dawn with Church mediation

requests.title: Petition for Warehouse License
requests.description: Seek a legal license to operate a riverside warehouse under guild oversight.

bargain.label: License only if Guild sponsors compliance

links.note: Garran moves against docks when reform fails.

requests.title: Slip Untaxed Spices Through Gate
requests.description: Move crates past the tariff wardens tonight.

bargain.label: Cut the Guard in for a silent watch

links.note: Guard complicit; asks for more budget cover.

requests.title: Trade Dossier on a Noble
requests.description: Offer damaging notes on an Upper noble in exchange for leniency later.

bargain.label: Swap for a formal Church clemency letter

game_log.bargain_label: Fund if Church publicly praises the Advisor
game_log.immediate_consequence: Church praises the Advisor; alms funded.
Tariff passed with staged consultation; optics improved.

steps.bargain_label: Cut the Guard in for a silent watch
steps.reason: Convert a risky smuggle into mutual dependency with the Guard.
steps.aftereffects: Gain favors with Guard and Smugglers, slight reputation hit; Guard later asks for more budget, which you can support.

steps.bargain_label: Patrols protect Church soup lines first
steps.reason: Leverage Church favor to turn funding into visible public good.
steps.aftereffects: Public safety improves around alms; both Guard and Church owe you.

steps.reason: Bank leverage on a compromised noble for future court maneuvers.
steps.aftereffects: Leverage spikes; Seraphine becomes more pliable for ledger favors.

example_player_path.summary: Player engineers a Guard–Smuggler–Church triangle to stabilize streets, earn cross-faction favors, and accumulate leverage for court manipulation.
